name: Hotel room rates
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-11.png)

Hotel room rates went up 1.5 times during the summer, but decreased by 100 as fall came.

Create a `price` variable with the value `120`.

Write a command that changes the existing value of the `price` variable:

* first increases by `1.5` times,
* then decreases it by `100`.

When performing the task, remember the priority of operations (multiplication and division operations are performed first, followed by addition and subtraction operations) and do not put extra brackets.
